abstract: There are signs that a new technology bubble is inflating, focused on a narrow sector of social media companies like LinkedIn. DealBook’s Evelyn M. Rusli talks to Nelson D. Schwartz about whether the valuation fears are valid.
snippet: There are signs that a new technology bubble is inflating, focused on a narrow sector of social media companies like LinkedIn. DealBook’s Evelyn M. Rusli talks to Nelson D. Schwartz about whether the valuation fears are valid.
lead_paragraph: There are signs that a new technology bubble is inflating, focused on a narrow sector of social media companies. DealBook’s Evelyn M. Rusli talks to Nelson D. Schwartz about whether the valuation fears are valid.

headline.main: Hope and Dread in Tech I.P.O.’s

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli, Nelson D. Schwartz and Mac William Bishop
